Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics

Class View

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.View
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
Const, ConstView
public class View extends org.jsfml.graphics.View
Represents a 2D camera which defines the region of the scene that is visible.

    • setViewport

      public void setViewport(@NotNull @NotNull FloatRect rect)
      Sets the viewport rectangle of this view. The viewport defines which portion of the render target is used by this view and is expressed using factors between 0 and 1 (percentage of the target's width and height). The default viewport rectangle is (0, 0, 1, 1).
      Parameters:
      rect - the new viewport rectangle

    • getTransform
